{{Actor| | type = Monster | name = Blue-colored acolyte | class = AcolyteBlue | game = Strife | doomednum = 231 | convid = 60 }}[[Classes]]: {{Class|StrifeHumanoid}}→{{Class|Acolyte}}→AcolyteBlue
A blue-colored Acolyte. These are sent to scan to Town Hall in MAP02 if you break the {{Class|PowerCoupling|Front's power coupling}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AcolyteBlue : {{Class|Acolyte}} { {{Property|Health}} 60 {{Property|Translation}} 6 }
